scripts.build:web: rm -rf web_deploy && mkdir -p web_deploy && cp -R web/. web_deploy/
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run bundle:openapi && npm run bundle:openapi:v3
scripts.lint:openapi: npm run generate:openapi && redocly lint spec/openapi.generated.yaml
scripts.bundle:openapi: npm run generate:openapi && mkdir -p web_deploy && redocly bundle spec/openapi.generated.yaml -o web_deploy/openapi.yaml && redocly bundle spec/openapi.generated.yaml -o web_deploy/openapi.json --ext json
scripts.bundle:openapi:v3: mkdir -p web_deploy && redocly bundle spec/v3/openapi.yaml -o web_deploy/openapi-v3.yaml && redocly bundle spec/v3/openapi.yaml -o web_deploy/openapi-v3.json --ext json
